extendedInfo.description: Learning Forward's 2013 Summer Conference is the premier learning opportunity for school-based leaders and the administrators who support them. Join us in Minneapolis July 21-24 and help us ensure that every teacher engages in powerful professional learning, and every student experiences great teaching every day. This yearâs conference features more than 150 practitioner-led sessions that address crucial issues for todayâs leaders, including: â¢	Implementing the Common Core State Standards;â¢	District support for centralized professional development;â¢	Using formative assessment data to make instructional decisions;â¢	Technology resources that improve classroom instruction;â¢	Maximizing time and resources for effective professional learning;â¢	Effective practices in teacher evaluation.Use the conference app to build your personal conference schedule; receive real-time alerts about special events, session changes, and conference activities; get speaker bios, session descriptions, handouts, and session evaluations; and more.Join us and impact the lives of the teachers and students you work with every day.
